SEARCH
Package org.myshelfie.view.GUI

Class OtherPlayerItemController

java.lang.Object
org.myshelfie.view.GUI.OtherPlayerItemController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class OtherPlayerItemController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the view of other players' public items, which are their bookshelf, their nickname, their hand and their tokens. Thus, all the methods refers to a player which will be different from the one referred as "me" in the main class GameControllerFX.

    • setEveryItemSaturation

      private void setEveryItemSaturation(javafx.scene.effect.ColorAdjust desaturation)
      Sets the saturation of every item in the player's view. This is used to gray out the player if he/she is offline.
      Parameters:
      desaturation - The desaturation to be applied
